    Join us!

    We are looking for undergraduates, graduate students (M.S./Ph.D.), and postdocs to join the lab! If you are interested in our work, please email Dr. Saima Shahid the following:
    - a brief research statement/cover letter describing your interests and why you think you will be a good fit for the lab,
    - your CV with contact information for three references

    About the Lab

    Our group is located at the Alfred Denny Building, School of Biosciences at the University of Sheffield in Sheffield, UK.
